backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and backend logic for a veterinary surgery case management app, including CRUD operations for cases, user profiles, and authorization via mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs and titles to the frontend files and components they affect, along with test IDs and confidence levels for build/verification planning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Structured text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose, key exports, and notable implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw React app, referencing the app icon, PWA manifest, and mounting the React root via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw defining app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets at multiple resolutions.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy with precaching of app shell assets, runtime caching of static files, and exclusions for auth and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and the sticky app header with login controls.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: React component rendering a culture workflow icon (ellipse/cylinder SVG) using WorkflowIconBase with optional completed-state X overlay support.
Renders a calendar/tear-off page SVG icon for the Daily Summary workflow type, with optional completed state.
Renders a document-with-checkmark SVG icon for the Discharge Notes workflow type, with optional completed state.
Renders a circular-arrow SVG icon for the Follow Up workflow type, with optional completed state.
Renders a sun/radial SVG icon for the Histo workflow type, with optional completed state.
Renders an x-ray bone image icon for the Imaging workflow type, overlaying an X mark when completed.
Renders a flask/beaker SVG icon for the Labs workflow type, with optional completed state.
Renders a speech-bubble SVG icon for the PDVM Notified workflow type, with optional completed state.
Renders a document-with-plus SVG icon for the Surgery Report workflow type, with optional completed state.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Dispatcher component that renders the correct workflow icon component based on a workflowType string prop.
Base SVG wrapper for workflow icons that applies consistent sizing, stroke color, and an X overlay when isCompleted is true.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Exports shared design tokens for workflow icons: per-type colors, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the CHECKLIST_ITEMS configuration array for all workflow task types and exports helper functions to derive task selections, remaining items, and colors from a Task object.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Compact card component for calendar views that displays a surgery case's pet info and clickable workflow icons for toggling task completion.
Expandable card component displaying full surgery case details, workflow task icons with toggle support, and edit/delete actions.
A dialog component for editing an existing surgery case, pre-populating form fields from the provided case data and submitting updates via the useUpdateCase mutation.
A dialog component for creating a new surgery case with fields for patient info, species, sex, dates, and task checklist selections, submitting via the useCreateCase mutation.
The main list view for surgery cases that fetches all cases and applies search, species/task filtering, sorting, and renders case cards along with controls for creating cases and CSV import/export.
A search input component with a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
A dropdown select control for choosing the sort order of the cases list, using predefined sort options.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other), persisting selections to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by pending task types and a completed-tasks toggle, persisting state to sessionStorage.
Renders the selected checklist tasks for a surgery case as clickable icon buttons that toggle task completion state.
React component that provides CSV import and export functionality for surgery cases, handling file parsing, progress tracking, error display, and backend create/update mutations.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A controlled date input component supporting MM/DD/YYYY keyboard entry with auto-slash insertion, blur validation, and a calendar popover picker.
Implements CSV export (serializing SurgeryCase arrays to a downloadable file) and CSV import (parsing, validating, and mapping rows to case data with error reporting).
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript types, valid enum values, and format constants.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides pure functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, incomplete tasks, or fully completed tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: Custom React hook that wraps the Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, transcript accumulation, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Utility function that preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts; used as a fallback when AI analysis returns semi-structured text.
Parses structured 'Label: Value' text line-by-line and maps recognized labels to CaseFormData fields, handling species, sex, dates, and string fields with voice input variations.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases with incomplete tasks using a hidden iframe and the browser's native print dialog, with color-coded task badges.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases including remaining checklist tasks, with proper field escaping and a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utility functions for PDF display, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values to human-readable strings, plus text truncation.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utility functions for CSV reports, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values to human-readable strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of SurgeryCase objects by a query string, matching against case fields and incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or number of remaining open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines the CaseFormData interface and constant option arrays for species and sex dropdowns used in case forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields, date parsing (MM/DD/YYYY, ISO), date-to-nanoseconds conversion utilities, and species/sex enum parsers.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that displays surgery cases in either a weekly calendar or list view, with filtering, sorting, search, and a new-case dialog.
Weekly calendar React component that renders a 7-column grid of surgery cases grouped by arrival date, with previous/next week navigation.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/ca: Utility functions for the calendar view: computing week day arrays, filtering cases by day, formatting week range strings, and checking if a week is the current week.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open (remaining) checklist task items from surgery cases and count the total number of open tasks across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty settings view component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and identity state via DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend data operations including fetching/mutating surgery cases, user profiles, tasks, dashboard data, and OpenAI config.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a light-mode-only OKLCH color token system for the app's design system, including custom tokens for patient name, species, complaint, and notes fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file intended for jspdf-autotable type augmentation.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file intended for jsPDF type augmentation.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for Worker, OCR results, logging, and enums for PSM and OEM modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends border radius and font family, and registers the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file that records the current version, feature list, architectural notes, and in-progress implementation details for the veterinary case management app.
